question: Which two countries fought "Battle of Tsorona, 2016"?
explanation: Battle of Tsorona was fought between Eritrea and Ethiopia from 12 June to 13 June 2016. In 1993, Eritrea got independence from Ethiopia but tensions and disagreements prevailed which lead to a full-fledged war between Eritrea and Ethiopia from 1998 to 2000. The war of 2016 ended with both sides claiming victory without any territorial changes.
